Item.Value: ... Oh? Hello dear you must be the newcomer everyone's been talking about. You can call me $Character_20$. Oh but aren't you just the spitting image of my Jesse. I can't wait for you to meet.
Hello dear, having a good day?
When I was younger, young men and women from all over would come through here. Adventurers and gloryseekers, looking to make names for themselves. I can see the same fire in you.
Oh, hello $^$, What can I do for you? [Talk:Talk|Construct Buildings:BuyBuildings|Maintain Buildings:Maintenance|Never Mind:Cancel]
What do you want to do?[Upgrade Buildings:UpgradeBuilding|Move Buildings:Move|Destroy Buildings:Destroy]
Oh look at you, all soaked. Alex, you know you shouldn't go out when it's raining. Go sit by the fire and I'll bring you some stew.

The sound of the rain is pretty isn't it? It always makes me think of when I was younger. My family used to settle in on those rainy nights around the fireplace and tell each other stories. I hope Jesse comes home soon.
... hm? Oh, hello dear. I was lost in my thoughts. It's alovely day out, isn't it? My husband and I used to go out for walks on days like this.
